0.2.1.name: wordpress/wpkeyme
0.2.1.description:
This plugin allows you to require a secret key that is passed via the URL: http://example.com/post-title/?key=string Specify the key in a custom value called "key" with the [string] or use the built in widget.

Stable version of the plugin are pushed to the WordPress repository, but the latest version of the plugin can be found at: https://bitbucket.org/excion/wpkeyme/

Issues/Bugs: https://bitbucket.org/excion/wpkeyme/issues
